channel.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
channel.description:
Hey guys! I just had this question and wanted to find some results.
It would be super nice of you guys to contribute to this poll! Thanks! :smiley:
[poll type=multiple min=1 max=4 public=true] * 3-5 Days * 6-10 Days * 11-15 Days * 16+ Days [/poll]

item.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
item.dc:creator: TXA
item.description:
Trey:

it takes me a while.

Same.

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?

item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:

item.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
item.dc:creator: niilo
item.description:
It always depends on how the song gets me into working on it, how inspired I am at the moment etc. but if I’m on vacation then it’s usually a couple of days, if not then a week, two weeks, or more

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?

item.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Voted 11-15 since when I make something I don’t post it straight away. I try to listen to what I make objectively in order to pick out mistakes or try to improve sections (namely with drums and avoiding too much repetition). I post in order to move on, whether it’s a failure or a success.

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?

item.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
It usually takes me a week to make a song, but it’s sometimes longer (or shorter). I made Sulfur Caves in 8 hours straight (without eating [don’t do that]) and I finished/posted it the next day. Pastel City took a week, but some parts of it were made (as a separate project) a month before I started working on it. My song Noir took a measly 2 hours, yet it somehow got reposted a year ago.

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?

item.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
I try to break up my time and work on about 30 mins- 1 hour per day. Sometimes Ill spend a week working on a track. Once in a while I spend a month or two on a track if I’m busy in…Life Lol

Read full topic

item.title: [POLL] How long does it take for you guys to compose one track?
item.dc:creator: Tropical_Madman
item.description:
Well for me. I could take up most of the week looking and searching for good music then braking it down into my own thing, but sometimes I just like something I think of it in my head. Mostly humming the tune at school.

But mostly taking up 6-10 day more likely. That’s me for ya.

Read full topic
